hero: Passionate about creating responsive and user-friendly web applications. Currently expanding my skills in modern web technologies.
sec1: I'm a software engineering student and passionate web developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. I enjoy creating responsive, user-friendly web applications that solve real-world problems.
sec2: My journey in web development started with HTML and CSS, and I've since expanded my skills to include JavaScript frameworks, server-side programming, and database management.
sec3: When I'm not coding, you can find me learning new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or exploring the latest web development trends.
contact desc: Feel free to reach out to me for any questions or opportunities. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your vision.
